function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Home as a place where social harms are stored and amplified during lockdowns","Impact":"Increased risk of social harm and negative health outcomes","Mitigation":"Implement support systems to address social harm and provide mental health resources for those at risk","Technologies":"Community support networks, mental health apps, remote counseling services","People":"Individuals in lockdown, particularly vulnerable or marginalized populations","Owner":"Community organizations, public health agencies, government"}]}
